name: Rocket roller (vikigames)
description:
I am selling the whole game at 120$ with all the rights.

You just need to tap at the right time otherwise deadly objects will destroy your rocket.

In RocketRoller you control the objects, not the player.
Simply TAP or HOLD to rotate obstacles around the Rocket.
as it moves downwards.

If you touch any of the objects, you die! How far can you get your rocket?

• Different Characters to Unlock
• Challenge Levels
• Endless Mode
• Unique Gameplay
• Galaxy Graphics & Theme

Nothing is going to protect the rocket so be careful
take the right decision when you hold or release.

NOTE:
If you have any game or any improvement idea do not hesitate
to contact us. We will be glad to hear from you.
What are you waiting for, Download the game and enjoy
do not forget to share it with your friends and family.
